entry.summary: Increase your security posture and receive an analysis of the top Azure WAF rules triggered, top offending IPs in the environment, SQL injection and Cross-site scripting attacks blocked by WAF, along with natural language explanation of the analysis.

entry.title: Public preview: Aspire dashboard support in Azure Container Apps
entry.summary: You can now access the Aspire dashboard in Azure Portal for your Azure Container Apps project.

entry.title: Public preview: Azure Functions support for HTTP streams in Python
entry.summary: Use HTTP streams in Python for processing large data streaming OpenAI responses and delivering dynamic content

entry.title: Azure Static Web Apps offers new Dedicated plan in preview
entry.summary: Enterprise-grade features for advanced use cases

entry.title: New Azure Event Grid capabilities support IoT solutions, event sources
entry.summary: Additional support for Azure Event Hubs means customers can run existing Kafka workloads

entry.title: Microsoft Dev Box introduces new ready-to-code and enterprise management capabilities
entry.summary: Dev Box has been updated with several new developer productivity and enterprise management capabilities.

entry.title: Public Preview Azure OpenAI Semantic Caching policy in Azure API Management
entry.summary: We're excited to announce the Public Preview for the Azure OpenAI Semantic Caching policy in Azure API Management! This innovative feature empowers customers to optimize token usage by leveraging semantic caching, which intelligently stores completions for prompts with similar meanings.

entry.title: GA Circuit Breaker in Azure API Management
entry.summary: The circuit breaker, now generally available in Azure API Management, is seamlessly integrated to provide customers with an easy-to-use solution for enhancing the resilience of their API environments.

entry.title: GA OData API type in Azure API Management
entry.summary: We're thrilled to announce the general availability of the OData API type in Azure API Management. This exciting addition extends Azure API Management's capabilities to include OData APIs, allowing users to apply standard API protections such as authentication, authorization, and rate limiting, alongside OData-specific policies for request validation.

entry.title: GA Load Balancer in Azure API Management
entry.summary: The General Availability of the Load Balancer feature in Azure API Management is here! Now, customers can effortlessly create a pool of backends and efficiently distribute the load across multiple endpoints. By establishing backend pools, users can seamlessly balance the load across various backends when integrating multiple backends for an API.

entry.title: GA Support for gRPC APIs in Azure API Management Self-hosted Gateway
entry.summary: We're thrilled to announce the general availability of gRPC support in Azure API Management through the self-hosted gateway. This exciting feature empowers customers to seamlessly manage their gRPC services as APIs within Azure API Management.

entry.title: GA Import Azure OpenAI enpoints as an APIs in Azure API Management
entry.summary: We're excited to announce the General Availability of the Import Azure OpenAI as an API feature in Azure API Management! With this new capability, customers can seamlessly import Azure OpenAI endpoints as an API with just a single click, streamlining the entire process.

entry.title: GA Azure OpenAI Emit Token Metric policy in Azure API Management
entry.summary: We're thrilled to announce the General Availability of the Azure OpenAI Emit Token Metric policy in Azure API Management! This new feature enables customers to effortlessly configure token usage metrics to be sent directly to Azure Application Insights, providing insights into the utilization of Azure OpenAI models across various applications and teams.

entry.title: GA Azure OpenAI Token Limit Policy in Azure API Management
entry.summary: We're excited to announce the General Availability of the Azure OpenAI Token Limit Policy in Azure API Management! This feature empowers customers to effectively manage and enforce limits on API consumers based on their usage of OpenAI tokens.

entry.title: GA Improved Onboarding Experience on VS Code for Azure Logic Apps Standard
entry.summary: We're thrilled to announce the General Availability of the improved onboarding experience for the Logic Apps standard VS Code extension. This enhancement aims to streamline the process of transitioning from developing workflows in the cloud to a local environment, making it easier for developers to get started with Logic Apps development.

entry.title: Public Preview Azure Logic Apps Standard] .NET 8 Custom Code Support
entry.summary: We’ve extended our built-in action capabilities to include support for calling .NET 8 custom code, now available in public preview.

entry.title: Public Preview Azure Logic Apps Standard Support for Zero Downtime deployment scenarios
entry.summary: We're excited to introduce support for Zero Downtime Deployment scenarios in Azure Logic Apps Standard, now available in Public Preview. This feature addresses one of the primary challenges in developing and maintaining mission-critical applications: ensuring continuous availability and responsiveness, even during updates or maintenance activities.

entry.title: Public Preview Azure Logic Apps Standard Deployment Scripting Tools in VS Code
entry.summary: We're excited to introduce the Logic Apps Standard Deployment Scripting Tools in Visual Studio Code, now available in Public Preview. With this enhancement, users can streamline the development, testing, and storage of Standard logic app workflows running in single-tenant Azure Logic Apps directly within VS Code, using any source control system.

entry.title: Public Preview Azure Logic Apps Monitoring Dashboard for Workflow Monitoring, Troubleshooting, and Resubmissions
entry.summary: We're excited to announce the Public Preview release of UI dashboards for Logic Apps Standard, designed to enhance the monitoring, diagnosis, and troubleshooting of Logic Apps workflow runs and failures. This dashboard provides users with valuable insights into the health and performance of their workflows, empowering them to quickly identify and address any issues that may arise.

entry.title: GA EDI capabilities in Azure Logic Apps Standard
entry.summary: We're thrilled to announce the General Availability of EDI capabilities in Azure Logic Apps Standard, featuring built-in operations for processing B2B workloads at scale. With this release, customers can leverage native connectors to handle both single and batched EDI messages efficiently, including larger payloads.

entry.title: Public Preview Azure Service Bus Enhancements
entry.summary: Azure Service Bus is a fully managed enterprise message broker that ensures secure and efficient delivery of data messages between different parts of your system, even when they're disconnected or processing tasks at different speeds. We're thrilled to announce a new feature to streamline message management and improve operational efficiency: batch delete.

entry.title: Public Preview Azure Integration Account Enhancements
entry.summary: We're excited to introduce enhancements to the Azure Integration Account in Public Preview, aimed at providing users with increased flexibility, resilience, and security in managing their integration artifacts.

entry.title: Public preview: Dynamic sessions in Azure Container Apps
entry.summary: You can now now have easy access to fast, ephemeral, sandboxed compute on Azure without managing infrastructure.

entry.title: Public Preview: Next-Gen Dashboards Experience in Azure Portal
entry.summary: We're adding a new Dashboards experience within the Azure Portal. You can use this feature in parallel to the current experience and it can be found in the Dashboard Hub and the Mobile App

entry.title: Public Preview: Set Java log levels in Azure Container Apps
entry.summary: Java application log levels can now be set dynamically in Azure Container Apps.

entry.title: Public Preview: Monitor apps with Java metrics in Azure Container Apps
entry.summary: Use Azure Monitor to see Java metrics in Azure Container Apps and take advantage of all the Azure Monitor features.

entry.title: Generally Available: Azure Functions Support for HTTP Streams in Node.js
entry.summary: You can now stream HTTP requests to, and responses from, your Functions Apps.

entry.title: Generally Available: Azure Functions extension for Dapr
entry.summary: You can now use Dapr’s powerful cloud native building block API with Azure Functions.

entry.title: Public Preview: Azure Functions brings new flexibility with Azure Functions Flex Consumption
entry.summary: Flex consumption is a new Azure Functions hosting plan that provides fast scaling and networking features with a serverless billing model.

entry.title: Public preview: Get started with Azure Functions using Visual Studio Code for the Web
entry.summary: You can now use a fully browser based end-to-end development environment for Azure Functions, starting from the Azure Portal.

entry.title: Public preview: Azure Functions extension for OpenAI
entry.summary: The Azure Functions extension for OpenAI enables you to build intelligent applications with OpenAI.

entry.title: Public preview: SDK type bindings for Azure Blog Storage with Azure Functions in Python
entry.summary: SDK type bindings for Azure Blob Storage with Azure Functions in Python allow you to easily integrate event and data sources with function applications.

entry.title: Generally Available: Azure Functions can now run on Azure Container Apps
entry.summary: You can now quickly build event driven, cloud native apps, with the flexibility to run functions along with other microservices, APIs, websites, workflows or any container hosted programs.

entry.title: Generally Available: Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager workload orchestration
entry.summary: You can now set taints and tolerations and rollout upgrades to only available resources.

entry.title: Public preview: KEDA in the Azure Portal
entry.summary: You can now easily create and monitor your scaled objects all within the Portal interface.

entry.title: Public preview: Kubernetes version 1.30 support in AKS
entry.summary: You can now benefit from the latest enhancements available in Kubernetes 1.30 when using AKS.

entry.title: Public preview: Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager support for property-based scheduling and override
entry.summary: You can now customize cluster-specific resources and schedule workloads to clusters based on new heuristics.

entry.title: Public preview: Deployment safeguards mutations in enforcement mode for AKS
entry.summary: Deployment safeguards in AKS can now adjust your deployment resources by applying best practices.

entry.title: Generally Available: Automated deployments for AKS
entry.summary: Automated deployments for AKS simplifies the process of setting up the authorization of a workflow to a repository, generation of a starter application, and more.

entry.title: Public preview: AKS Automatic
entry.summary: AKS Automatic clusters are optimized to run most production workloads and provision compute resources based on Kubernetes manifests. The streamlined configuration follows AKS best practices and recommendations for cluster and workload setup, scalability, and security.

entry.title: Generally Available: 32TB storage support in Azure Database for MySQL Flexible Server Business Critical
entry.summary: You can now leverage storage support up to 32TB on the Business Critical service tier.

entry.title: Public Preview: Microsoft Copilot now offers supportability in Azure Database for MySQL
entry.summary: Microsoft Copilot in Azure extends capabilities to Azure Database for MySQL.

entry.title: Generally Available: Accelerated logs in Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server
entry.summary: Gain a performance boost in the Business Critical service tier of Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server with accelerated logs.

entry.title: General availability: Azure SQL updates for late-May 2024
entry.summary: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in late-May 2024.

entry.title: Public Preview - On-demand backup and Export in Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server
entry.summary: This feature provides an ability to export at-moment physical backup of the server to Azure storage account (Azure Blob Storage).

entry.title: Public preview - Major version upgrade support for PostgreSQL 16
entry.summary: In-place major version upgrade support for PostgreSQL 16 in Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server.

entry.title: Public Preview: Azure SQL updates for late-May 2024
entry.summary: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in late-May 2024.

entry.title: Public Preview: New Azure SQL Database skills introduced to Microsoft Copilot in Azure
entry.summary: New Copilot skills assist in efficient management and operation of Azure SQL Database.

entry.title: Public Preview: In-database embeddings in Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server
entry.summary: Create text embeddings with sub 10ms latency from an LLM deployed within your Azure Database for PostgreSQL instance.

entry.title: Public Preview: Index recommendations in Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server
entry.summary: Optimize your workload by creating suggested indexes and dropping duplicated or unused indexes.

entry.title: Public preview: Change from serverless to provisioned capacity mode
entry.summary: Easily change the capacity mode of an Azure Cosmos DB account from serverless to provisioned capacity using Azure portal or Azure CLI without any hassle.

entry.title: General Availability: Azure AI extension in Azure Database for PostgreSQL
entry.summary: The Azure AI extension allows customers to leverage large language models and build rich PostgreSQL GenAI applications.

entry.title: General Availability: Azure Cosmos DB Vercel integration
entry.summary: We're excited to announce Azure Cosmos DB integration with Vercel Generally Available.

entry.title: Public Preview: DiskANN vector indexing and search in Azure Cosmos DB NoSQL
entry.summary: Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL built-in vector search powered by DiskANN is in public preview.

entry.title: General availability: Azure Cosmos DB Go SDK
entry.summary: The Azure Cosmos DB Go SDK is now available with improved support for global distribution.

entry.title: Public Preview: vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB cross-region disaster recovery (DR)
entry.summary: Cross region DR allows you to switch to another region in case of an outage.

entry.title: General availability: Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL integrations in LangChain and Semantic Kernel
entry.summary: Implement your RAG pipelines with Azure Cosmos DB and LangChain and Semantic Kernel!

entry.title: Public preview: Azure Cache for Redis Enterprise now offers a 1GB E1 SKU
entry.summary: Azure Cache for Redis Enterprise will offer yet another smaller 1GB SKU for your vector search and semantic caching needs levering the powerful capabilities of RediSearch module.

entry.title: General availability: Azure Cache for Redis triggers and bindings for Azure Functions
entry.summary: Trigger serverless functions through Azure Cache for Redis.

entry.title: General availability: Computed properties in Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL
entry.summary: Computed properties make it easy to write NoSQL query logic once and reference it many times!

entry.title: Experimentation capabilities for Azure App Configuration now in public preview
entry.summary: Enables online experimentation for web, mobile, and Generative AI apps

entry.title: General availability: Azure Cache for Redis now supports Microsoft Entra ID authentication and authorization
entry.summary: Azure Cache for Redis now offers a password-free authentication mechanism by integrating with Microsoft Entra. This integration is complemented with the role-based access control that open source Redis supports.

entry.title: Azure Machine Learning - General Availability for Build 2024
entry.summary: One new feature now available in GA enables you to create and customize AI workflows using task-specific Language skills/models to complete business use cases.

entry.title: Azure Machine Learning - Public Preview for Build 2024
entry.summary: Three features now available in preview enable you to enjoy simplified management of the customer-managed key (CMK) encrypted workspace, take advantage of our content filtering system alongside models that you can access through Models as a Service, and bring in indexes from Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore and Pinecone for use in RAG workflows.

entry.title: Public Preview: Migrate virtual machine backups using standard backup policy to enhanced backup policy
entry.summary: Azure Backup now supports migrating virtual backups using standard backup policy to enhanced backup policy.

entry.title: General availability: ExpressRoute Seamless Gateway Migration
entry.summary: ExpressRoute customers can now deploy a second gateway to the Gateway Subnet. This will enable a seamless migration to an Az-enabled Gateway SKU and upgrade your Public IP configurations.

entry.title: General Availability: Data API builder
entry.summary: Add a feature-rich data API to an Azure database or on-prem database using Microsoft's open-source Data API builder.

entry.title: Public preview: Sensitive data protection for Azure Front Door Web Application Firewall
entry.summary: Protect the sensitive data getting stored in your Web Application Firewall (WAF) using log scrubbing on Azure’s global Web Application Firewall running on Azure Front Door.

entry.title: Introducing GPT-4o: OpenAI’s new flagship multimodal model now in preview on Azure
entry.summary: Microsoft is thrilled to announce the launch of GPT-4o, OpenAI’s new flagship model, now available on Azure AI in preview. This groundbreaking multimodal model integrates text, vision, and audio capabilities, setting a new standard for generative and conversational AI experiences. GPT-4o is available now in Azure OpenAI Service, in preview, with support for text and image. Azure OpenAI Service customers can explore GPT-4o’s extensive capabilities through a preview playground in Azure OpenAI Studio starting today in two regions in the US. This initial release focuses on text and vision inputs to provide a glimpse into the model's potential, paving the way for further capabilities like audio.

entry.title: Azure Front Door server variable enhancement generally available
entry.summary: Azure Front Door supports capturing URL path and URL case transformation in rules set and server variable.

entry.title: Public Preview: Azure Site Recovery support for Azure Trusted Launch VMs (Windows OS)
entry.summary: Azure Site Recovery support for Windows Trusted launch VMs

entry.title: Announcing the General Availability of GPT-4 Turbo with Vision on Azure OpenAI Service
entry.summary: We are thrilled to announce the general availability of GPT-4 Turbo with Vision on the Azure OpenAI Service, which processes both text and image inputs and replaces several preview models. This multimodal model has already been used by customers in various industries to enhance efficiencies and innovate, with case studies to be featured at the upcoming Build conference. For deployment details and future enhancements, including JSON mode and function calling for image inputs, please refer to our Azure OpenAI Service resources and updates.

entry.title: Public preview: Initialization taints in AKS
entry.summary: You can now use node initialization taints in AKS e.g. in scenarios where you may need extra time to setup your nodes.

entry.title: GA: Support for disabling Windows outboundNAT in AKS
entry.summary: You can now manually disable Windows outboundNAT when creating new Windows node pools in Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

entry.title: Public Preview: NFS Azure Files volume mount support in Azure Container Apps
entry.summary: You can now mount NFS file shares in Azure Container Apps.

entry.title: General availability: Customer-managed keys on existing accounts
entry.summary: Configure customer-managed keys for your existing Azure Cosmos DB account.

entry.title: Public Preview: SQL Server on Azure VM storage configuration deployment experience with support for Premium SSD v2
entry.summary: Customers can now choose Premium SSD v2 for the Ebdsv5 and Ebsv5 virtual machine series with the additional ability to opt-in for NVMe support.

entry.title: General availability: Latest version of the TimeScaleDB extension on Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server
entry.summary: Upgrade to the latest TimeScaleDB extension on Azure for enhanced time-series data handling and improved performance.

entry.title: General availability: Latest PostgreSQL minor versions supported by Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server
entry.summary: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server now supports minor versions 16.2, 15.6, 14.11, 13.14, and 12.18.

entry.title: General Availability: Azure Cosmos DB Data Explorer keyboard shortcuts
entry.summary: Work Smarter: Enhance Productivity with Azure Cosmos DB Data Explorer shortcut keys.

entry.title: General availability: Azure Cosmos DB API for MongoDB RU supports version 5.0 and 6.0
entry.summary: Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB now supports MongoDB v5 and v6.

entry.title: Public preview: Standby pools for Virtual Machine Scale Sets with flexible orchestration
entry.summary: Standby Pools for Virtual Machine Scale Sets with Flexible Orchestration provides the ability to reduce scale out latency and increase scale out performance.

entry.title: Azure Ultra Disk Storage is now available in Italy North
entry.summary: Now available in Italy North region, Azure Ultra Disk Storage provides high-performance along with sub-millisecond latency for your most-demanding workloads.

entry.title: Generally Available: Azure Red Hat OpenShift v4.14 at install time
entry.summary: Azure Red Hat OpenShift version 4.14 is now available at install time.

entry.title: Public Preview: Azure Storage Actions is now available in 14 more regions
entry.summary: Azure Storage Actions is a fully managed platform that helps you automate data management operations for object storage and data lakes. The preview is now available in 14 more regions.

entry.title: Azure Front Door log scrubbing of sensitive data is general available
entry.summary: Azure Front Door supports removing sensitive data from Azure Front Door access log.

entry.title: General Availability - Azure API Center
entry.summary: Azure API Center is now generally available, providing a centralized solution to manage the challenges of API sprawl, which is exacerbated by the rapid proliferation of APIs and AI solutions. Azure API Center offers a unified inventory for seamless discovery, consumption, and governance of APIs, regardless of their type, lifecycle stage, or deployment location.

entry.title: Azure Virtual Network Manager user-defined route (UDR) management now in public preview
entry.summary: UDR management in Azure Virtual Network Manager is now in public preview, enabling users to describe their desired routing behavior via configuration, simplifying the management of routing behaviors at scale.

entry.title: Azure Spring Apps Feature Update Q1 2024: Save up to 47% with Azure savings plan
entry.summary: Announcing the exciting feature updates for Azure Spring Apps in Q1 2024. Save up to 47% with Azure Savings plan.

entry.title: General availability: Mexico Central region added to Azure HDInsight
entry.summary: HDInsight is now generally available in Mexico Central. Azure HDInsight is a managed, full-spectrum, open-source analytics service in the cloud for enterprises. You can use open-source frameworks such as Hadoop, Apache Spark, Apache Hive, LLAP, Apache Kafka, and more. For more information about HDInsight, see the Azure HDInsight documentation.

entry.title: Public Preview: Azure HDInsight on AKS is now available for preview in 7 new regions
entry.summary: Azure HDInsight on AKS is now available for preview in seven new regions - East US 2 EUAP, West US, Japan East, Australia East, Canada Central, North Europe, Brazil South. Azure HDInsight on AKS is a modern, reliable, secure, and fully managed Platform as a Service (PaaS) that runs on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). HDInsight on AKS allows you to deploy popular Open-Source Analytics workloads like Apache Spark™, Apache Flink®️, and Trino without the overhead of managing and monitoring containers. For more information about Azure HDInsight on AKS, see the documentation.

entry.title: General availability: Azure Bastion Developer SKU
entry.summary: The Bastion Developer SKU represents a novel, cost-effective, and streamlined version of the Bastion service.

entry.title: Generally Available: Azure Chaos Studio supports Resource tags
entry.summary: Azure Chaos Studio is now supporting resource tags.

entry.title: Public preview: Azure Monitor pipeline (at edge)
entry.summary: We are announcing public preview Azure Monitor pipeline (for edge). With this, we are now extending our Azure Monitor pipeline capabilities from the cloud to the edge, enabling seamless and high-scale data ingestion with centralized configuration management.

entry.title: Infrastructure and quality enhancements for Azure Container Registry
entry.summary: ACR now supports expanded registry capacity of up to 40TiB and optimized geo-replication performance.

entry.title: Public Preview: Azure Dedicated Host - Redeploy
entry.summary: Introducing redeploying capability for Azure dedicated hosts

entry.title: Public preview: Extensibility model in Azure Deployment Environments
entry.summary: Azure Deployment Environments is adding a new extensibility model that empowers customers to customize deployment workflows using Bicep, Terraform, Pulumi, or any other infrastructure-as-code (IaC) framework of their choice.

entry.title: Public preview: Azure Change Analysis New Portal Experience
entry.summary: Viewing changes to your Azure resources just became easier! With Azure Resource Graph’s Change Analysis, you can now view all your resource changes across all your tenants and subscriptions in the Azure Portal.

entry.title: General availability: Application Gateway Web Application Firewall (WAF) inspection limit & size enforcement
entry.summary: Azure’s regional Web Application Firewall (WAF) running on Application Gateway now supports greater control over request body inspection, and maximum size limits for request bodies and file uploads.

entry.title: Generally Available: Index Advisor in Azure Cosmos DB helps optimize your index policy for NoSQL queries
entry.summary: Reduce RU-costs and improve query speeds with Index Advisor!

entry.title: General availability: Semantic caching with vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB
entry.summary: Leverage historical LLM responses with Azure Cosmos DB and LangChain!

entry.title: Public preview: Filtered vector search in vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB
entry.summary: Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB improves its vector search capabilities with filtered vector search, now in preview.

entry.title: General availability: Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server enhanced disaster recovery features
entry.summary: Explore advanced disaster recovery with Virtual Endpoints and seamless role-swapping in Azure Database for PostgreSQL.

entry.title: General availability: Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL geo-redundant backup and restore
entry.summary: Store cluster backup in another region. Restore cluster in the primary or another region.

entry.title: General availability: HNSW vector index in vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB
entry.summary: The HNSW vector index is now generally available in vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB.

entry.title: General availability: Virtual network flow logs
entry.summary: Gain visibility of IP traffic flowing through your virtual networks

entry.title: Azure Virtual Network Manager security admin rule generally available in all public regions
entry.summary: Azure Virtual Network Manager's security admin rule configuration is now generally available in all public regions, empowering users to enforce security rules across their virtual networks globally.

entry.title: Public Preview: Azure Monitor Agent Upload to Storage and Event Hubs
entry.summary: Azure Monitor Agent can now upload to Azure Storage and Event Hubs.

entry.title: Public Preview – DR for Shared Disks – Azure Site Recovery
entry.summary: Now you can use the benefits of Shared Disk for your mission-critical applications such as SQL FCI, SAP ASCS, Scale-out File Servers, etc., while ensuring business continuity and disaster recovery with Azure Site Recovery.

entry.title: Azure Data Box Disk is now available with hardware encryption
entry.summary: Azure Data Box Disk is now Generally Available with hardware encryption.

entry.title: GA: Azure Monitor log search alerts support managed identities
entry.summary: A common challenge for developers is the management of credentials for applications to use when connecting to resources. Managed identities provide an automatically managed identity in Microsoft Entra ID. Applications can use managed identities to obtain Microsoft Entra tokens without having to manage any credentials.

entry.title: Using Azure Virtual Network Manager network groups in security admin rules is now in public preview
entry.summary: Using your Azure Virtual Network Manager network groups in the source and/or destination of security admin rules is now in public preview, enabling users to achieve network isolation across different environments and manage network segments more easily at scale.

entry.title: Azure Machine Learning - General Availability for April 2024
entry.summary: Three features now available in GA enable you to seamlessly log inference data to a central location, set up event-driven applications, processes, or workflows based on Azure Machine Learning events, and utilize lifecycle management of features from creation through archival.

entry.title: General availability: Azure Virtual Network encryption availability in all regions
entry.summary: Azure Virtual Network encryption is a feature of Azure Virtual Networks. Virtual network encryption allows you to seamlessly encrypt and decrypt traffic between Azure Virtual Machines.

entry.title: Announcing Public Preview of Query editor in Azure Monitor Metrics
entry.summary: Public Preview of Query editor in Azure Monitor Metrics is now Available! Get started with Query editor to access advanced querying capabilities within Azure Monitor Metrics. With the Query Editor's seamless integration of the widely adopted Prometheus Query Language (PromQL), customers can unlock advanced querying capabilities within their Azure Monitor Workspace. With PromQL, you can now efficiently analyze Prometheus metrics, identify trends, troubleshoot issues, and optimize resource utilization for better performance and reliability.

entry.title: Generally available: Azure Site Recovery update rollup 73 - April 2024
entry.summary: This article describes the improvements for the latest version of Azure Site Recovery components.

entry.title: Azure Event Grid support for last will & testament (LWT) capabilities now in Public Preview
entry.summary: Ensures predictable and reliable flow of communication among MQTT clients during unexpected disconnections.

entry.title: GA: New Property for Disks-LastOwnershipUpdateTime
entry.summary: Introducing LastOwnershipUpdateTime for Disks in Azure Portal, PowerShell, and CLI. It indicates the last state change time for the Disk, useful for tracking its current state and when it was last updated.

entry.title: General availability: Azure SQL updates for mid-April 2024
entry.summary: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-April 2024.

entry.title: Azure Red Hat OpenShift April 2024 updates
entry.summary: New features include support for ARO in Azure Terraform provider, ability to bring your own NSG, new GPU instance types for Day 2 operations, and more!

entry.title: General availability: Extensible key management using Azure Key Vault for SQL Server on Linux
entry.summary: Extensible key management (EKM) using Azure Key Vault in SQL Server on Linux is now generally available from SQL Server 2022 CU12 onwards.

entry.title: General Availability: Virtual private network (VPN) with Azure Managed Instance for Apache Cassandra
entry.summary: For enhanced security in your virtual network architectures where outbound connectivity is not allowed.

entry.title: General Availability: Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server networking with Azure Private Link
entry.summary: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server now supports Private Endpoints in General Availability.

entry.title: Public Preview: Long-term retention for Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server
entry.summary: The feature will allow you to retain/manage backups for up to 10 years in the standard tier according to your compliance and auditing needs.

entry.title: Generally available: Defender for Cloud supports Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server
entry.summary: You can now protect Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server with Microsoft Defender for Cloud.

entry.title: Public Preview: Mirroring Azure Cosmos DB in Microsoft Fabric
entry.summary: Get near-real time analytics on your Azure Cosmos DB data in Microsoft Fabric with zero-ETL.

entry.title: Run Azure Load Testing on Azure App Service web apps
entry.summary: Load test your web apps directly from Azure App Service in Azure portal.

entry.title: Native Delta Lake Output Now Generally Available in Azure Stream Analytics
entry.summary: The native support for Delta Lake output in Azure Stream Analytics is now generally available.

entry.title: App Service virtual network integration multi plan subnet join
entry.summary: We're excited to announce that the multi plan subnet join for virtual network integration is now available in preview in all regions!

entry.title: General Available: Azure Synapse Runtime for Apache Spark 3.4 is now GA
entry.summary: Azure Synapse Runtime for Apache Spark 3.4 is now Generally Available

entry.title: Public preview: Backup and restore of virtual machines with private endpoint enabled disks
entry.summary: Azure Backup can now help you back up virtual machines using private endpoint-enabled disks. You can now also specify network settings to be used by the restored disks while initiating the restore process.

entry.title: Azure Virtual Network Manager Security Admin Rule generally available in 45 regions
entry.summary: Azure Virtual Network Manager's security admin rule configuration is now generally available in 45 regions, empowering users to enforce security rules across their virtual networks globally.

entry.title: General Availability of Azure Logic Apps connectors for IBM Mainframe and Midranges
entry.summary: Exciting news! Our IBM Mainframe and Midrange connectors, including IBM 3270, IBM CICS, IBM DB2, IBM i, IBM MQ, and IBM IMS, are now generally available. These connectors address highly sought-after customer requests, bring capabilities to extend Azure Logic Apps cloud native workloads with some of the oldest systems ever built for Mainframes and Midranges.

entry.title: Public Preview of Azure OpenAI and AI Search in-app connectors for Logic Apps (Standard)
entry.summary: We're thrilled to announce two new built-in connectors for Azure Logic Apps: Azure OpenAI and Azure AI Search. With the increasing adoption of AI technologies, there's a growing demand to integrate these capabilities seamlessly into Logic Apps workflows. To address this need, we're launching the Public Preview of these connectors, bridging the gap between Logic Apps and AI.

entry.title: Public Preview: Resiliency Review on Azure Advisor
entry.summary: Improve your workload’s resiliency and optimize your cloud deployments by reviewing recommendations on Advisor

entry.title: Public preview: ExpressRoute Metro for High Resiliency
entry.summary: ExpressRoute lets you extend your on-premises networks into the Microsoft cloud over a private connection with the help of a connectivity provider. With ExpressRoute, you can establish connections to Microsoft cloud services, such as Microsoft Azure and Microsoft 365.

entry.title: Public preview: Azure Backup supports long term retention for backup of Azure Database for MySQL– Flexible Server
entry.summary: Now you can retain backups for up to 10 years by defining your own backup and retention policy for MySQL- Flexible server.

entry.title: Public Preview: Azure Backup enables vaulted backups for Azure Files for comprehensive data protection.
entry.summary: Azure Backup now supports transferring Azure Files backups to the vault for comprehensive protection against severe data loss scenarios like ransomware attack.

entry.title: Long Audio API will be retired on 31 March 2027 – Migrate to the new batch synthesis API
entry.summary: Long Audio API will be retired on March 31, 2027

entry.title: Custom .Net deserializer for Azure Stream Analytics will be retired on 30 September 2024.

entry.title: GA: Azure Logic Apps Designer for Consumption
entry.summary: We're thrilled to announce the general availability of the new Azure Logic Apps Designer for Consumption, revolutionizing your workflow experience with unparalleled speed, smoothness, and reliability. Unifying the designer experience across all supported platforms, including standard Azure Logic Apps, the Azure Logic Apps Visual Studio Code extension, and consumption Azure Logic Apps in the portal, ensures seamless usability and familiarity wherever you work.

entry.title: Public Preview: Safety evaluations for generative AI applications in Azure AI Studio
entry.summary: Measure your generative AI application’s susceptibility to jailbreak attacks and to producing unsafe content, so you can implement effective mitigations and go from prototype to production with confidence.

entry.title: GA: Azure SQL Trigger support for Azure Functions
entry.summary: You can now build application logic in Azure Function apps which can be driven by the data from Azure SQL database

entry.title: Public preview: Support for Key Vault Certificates in Azure Container Apps
entry.summary: You can now use Azure Key Vault to store and manage your own TLS/SSL certificates for use with Azure Container Apps.

entry.title: Generally Available: Free managed certificates on Azure Container Apps
entry.summary: Azure Container Apps now provides a free managed certificate for your custom domain.

entry.title: Public preview: PowerShell 7.4 support for Azure Functions
entry.summary: You can now develop apps using PowerShell 7.4 locally and deploy them to Azure Functions

entry.title: Public Preview: Azure Container Apps OpenTelemetry collector support
entry.summary: You can now use open-source standards to send your app’s data.

entry.title: Public Preview: Real-time text translation using the azure_ai extension in Azure Database for PostgreSQL
entry.summary: Text translation right within SQL facilitates building intelligent multilingual applications on Azure Database for PostgreSQL.

entry.title: Public Preview: Invoke Azure Machine Learning models using the azure_ai extension
entry.summary: Invoke Azure Machine Learning models in real-time from SQL in Azure Database for PostgreSQL.

entry.title: General availability: Migration service in Azure Database for PostgreSQL
entry.summary: Seamlessly migrate PostgreSQL to Azure using a managed service for complete schema and data transfers, hassle-free.

entry.title: General availability: Rate Limiting on ExpressRoute Direct Circuits
entry.summary: Rate Limiting is now generally available over ExpressRoute Direct port circuits, providing enhanced control over bandwidth usage. This Quality of Service (QoS) feature prevents circuits from bursting beyond their configured bandwidth, thereby improving network performance and reliability. Rate Limiting can be enabled for each circuit individually, offering flexibility to prioritize certain circuits. This feature can be activated during or after the creation of the ExpressRoute Direct circuit.

entry.title: Public preview: Change partition key of a container in Azure Cosmos DB (NoSQL API)
entry.summary: The ability to change the partition key of a container in Azure Cosmos is now available in preview for NoSQL API.

entry.title: Public Preview: Azure SQL Database Mirroring in Microsoft Fabric
entry.summary: Mirroring Azure SQL Database provides an easy experience to continuously replicate SQL DB data directly into Microsoft Fabric.

entry.title: Azure Static Web Apps distributed functions capability now in Public Preview
entry.summary: Reduced latency by distributing managed functions to regions of high demand.

entry.title: Breaking Changes to Azure API Management Workspaces
entry.summary:
As part of our commitment to enhancing workspaces (in Public Preview) within Azure API Management, we are implementing several critical breaking changes effective June 14, 2024. These changes are designed to streamline functionality and improve overall performance.
These breaking changes will be effective from June 14, 2024. We strongly advise making any necessary adjustments to your workspace configurations before this date to ensure uninterrupted service.

entry.title: General Availability: Automatic Scaling for App Service Web Apps
entry.summary: Azure App Service is pleased to announce general availability of the "Automatic Scaling" feature.

entry.title: Preview: New Features in Azure Container Storage
entry.summary: Azure Container Storage is a fully managed volume orchestration service built natively for containers. New capabilities include support for Temp SSD, simplified installation via AKS CLI, and scalable storage for cost-efficient workload management.

entry.summary: Azure Files geo-redundancy for 100TiB standard SMB file shares is now generally available.

entry.summary: Force detach zone redundant disks during zone outage and take advantage of ZRS ability to achieve an RPO of 0.

entry.summary: Azure NetApp Files now supports smaller 1 TiB capacity pool sizes, lowered from 2 TiB, when used with volumes using standard network features.

entry.summary: The next generation of general purpose service tier brings improved performance, 32 TB storage and higher database density.

entry.title: Public preview: Public IP Domain Name Label Scope
entry.summary: Announcing the public preview for a new capability in Azure public IP address that can prevent DNS subdomain takeover while still allowing for re-use of DNS names.

entry.title: Public preview: Database watcher for Azure SQL
entry.summary: Enable in-depth, managed monitoring of Azure SQL databases, elastic pools, and managed instances.

entry.title: Generally available: Application Gateway (v2) IPv6 support
entry.summary: Azure Application Gateway v2 enables dual-stack (IPv4 and IPv6) connectivity from the clients, providing more flexible and reliable access to the backend Applications.

entry.title: General availability: Listener TLS certificates management in the Azure portal
entry.summary: You can now manage the TLS certificates associated with Listeners through Azure portal.

entry.title: Operator and CRD support with Azure Managed Prometheus
entry.summary: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus will support CRD-based configs for scrape jobs to collect metrics from workloads running in your AKS cluster. With this new update, customers can use custom resources (service monitor and pod monitor) to configure metric collection with Managed Prometheus.

entry.title: Microsoft open sources Retina: A cloud-native container networking observability platform
entry.summary: The Microsoft's Azure Container Networking team is announcing Retina, a cloud-native container networking observability platform that enables Kubernetes users, admins, and developers to visualize, observe, debug, and analyze Kubernetes’ workload traffic irrespective of Container Network Interface (CNI), operating system (OS), and cloud.

entry.title: Billing for Azure Monitor stateful log search alerts
entry.summary: Starting from May 1, 2024, you will be charged for stateful log alerts in Azure Monitor.

entry.title: Public preview: Kubernetes AI Toolchain Operator (KAITO) add-on for AKS
entry.summary: You can now choose from preset LLMs with images hosted by AKS and split inferencing across multiple lower-GPU count VMs

entry.title: Generally Available: Cost analysis add-on for AKS
entry.summary: You can now better understand the infra costs associated with running applications at the namespace and cluster levels and identify opportunities to optimize resource utilization through an Azure native experience.

entry.title: Generally Available: Windows Gen 2 VM support in AKS
entry.summary: YOu can now use Gen 2 VM SKUs for Windows nodepools in AKS.

entry.title: Public preview: Windows GPU support in AKS
entry.summary: You can now run GPU workloads, such as machine learning, video encoding, large simulations, and gaming, on Windows nodepools in AKS.

entry.title: Generally Available: Kubernetes 1.29 support in AKS
entry.summary: You can now take advantage of Kubernetes 1.29 version with AKS in production environment.

entry.title: Generally Available: Custom kubelet configuration for Windows in AKS

entry.title: Public preview: Azure CNI static block IP allocation support in AKS

entry.title: Public preview: Deployment safeguards in AKS
entry.summary: You can now use deployment safeguards to implement Kubernetes best practices and get warnings on deployment or deny the deployment of manifest files that are not following best practices.

entry.title: Generally Available: Azure CNI overlay dual stack Support in AKS (Linux only)
entry.summary: You can now deploy AKS clusters in dual stack mode which now enables resource connection through IPv4 or IPv6.

entry.title: Generally Available: VM IP based load balancer in AKS
entry.summary: You can now choose IP-based backend pool membership for new or existing clusters in AKS.

entry.title: Generally Available: Host Network Security Group (NSG) control in AKS
entry.summary: You can now directly configure allowed ports in your nodepool settings.

entry.title: Generally Available: HostPort auto assign in AKS
entry.summary: AKS now lets you deploy pods without manually specifying host ports.

entry.title: Generally Available: Instance level Public IP tags in AKS

entry.title: Public preview: Trusted launch support in AKS

entry.title: Generally Available: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) support for 5K Node limit by default for standard tier clusters

entry.title: You can now opt in automatically renew your reservation at time of purchase.

entry.summary: Starting from May 1, 2024, you will be charged for stateful log alerts in Azure Monitor.

entry.title: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus now supports TLS & mTLS based scraping
entry.summary: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus now supports TLS & mTLS based scraping for Prometheus instance served with TLS. To enable TLS and mTLS based scraping, you can configure the TLS settings in the ConfigMap.

entry.title: Azure IoT Edge supports Ubuntu Core Snaps
entry.summary: We are expanding the Azure IoT Edge supported platforms to include Ubuntu Core Snaps on IoT Edge as a Tier 1 supported operating system.

entry.summary: Learn how to qualify for free egress when moving your data out of Azure.

entry.summary: Java apps are now attuned to the container environment and primed for better performance and reliability by default.

entry.title: WhatsApp Business Platform now available for applications built on Azure

This latest messaging service helps businesses create intelligent B2C communication workflows to reach more customers at scale and deliver safe, reliable communications to customers worldwide.

entry.title: Generally Available: Azure Chaos Studio supports new fault for Azure Event Hubs
entry.summary: Azure Chaos Studio supports new faults for Azure Event Hubs.

Additionally, we are unveiling a new API governance feature in API Center, enabling API linting and analysis based on customer-owned design guidelines.

entry.title: Generally available: Azure Blob Storage Cold Tier in Poland Central, Qatar Central and Azure China
entry.summary: Azure Blob Storage Cold Tier in generally available in Poland Central, Qatar Central and Azure China.

entry.title: General availability: Azure Virtual Network encryption now in additional regions
entry.summary: Azure Virtual Network encryption is a feature of Azure Virtual Networks. Virtual network encryption allows you to seamlessly encrypt and decrypt traffic between Azure Virtual Machines. Now available in additional regions.

Destination NAT allows network administrators to publish applications to the broader internet through a public IP address assigned to a Firewall Network Virtual Appliance deployed in a Virtual WAN hub.

entry.title: Enable replication for added VMware VM data disks
entry.summary: Azure Site Recovery now supports enabling replication for data disks that you add to a VMware VM that's already enabled for disaster recovery.

entry.title: GA: Azure API Management Developer Portal Unveils Enhanced Features for Increased Developer Productivity
entry.summary: The API Management developer portal is an automatically generated, fully customizable website with the documentation of your APIs. It's where API consumers can discover your APIs, learn how to use them, request access, and try them out. We recently improved the portal editor interface to boost your productivity and enhance the interactions with your favorite features and tools.

entry.title: Public preview: Azure Application Gateway introduces support for TLS and TCP protocols
entry.summary: TLS and TCP protocol support now available through Azure Application Gateway.

entry.title: Announcing NBCROW Compression in Kusto's TDS Implementation
entry.summary: A new feature that reduces the data transfer for MSSQL queries on Kusto.

entry.title: Sending a log search alert with cross tenant target resource will no longer be supported
entry.summary: As of March 15, 2024, this behavior will change and sending a log search alert with a cross tenant target resource (except for the lighthouse case) will no longer be supported. Alerts will not be sent to unauthorized target resources, and log search alert rules with an unauthorized target will be ignored. This will ensure that only authorized users can receive and investigate log search alerts.

entry.title: Update records in a Kusto Database (public preview)
entry.summary: The new .update command allows you to update records (rows) in a Kusto Database (either in Azure Data Explorer or in Fabric KQL Database). This is a new tool to help you build great data pipeline!

entry.title: Public Preview: Regional Disaster Recovery by Azure Backup for AKS

entry.summary: Easily migrate PostgreSQL to Azure with a managed service supporting full schema and data migrations, without complexity.

entry.summary: With SQL Server enabled by Azure Arc you can now begin your migration journey from directly within the Azure Arc environment with recommended Azure SQL deployment option that best fits your workload needs.

entry.title: Azure Firewall: Flow Trace Logs and Autoscaling based on number of connections are now generally available
entry.summary: Flow Trace Logs provide more visibility into the TCP handshake, providing insight into whether traffic is properly flowing through the firewall. In addition, Azure Firewall can now autoscale based on number of connections, providing more scaling adaptability to dynamic workloads.

entry.title: Azure Firewall: Parallel IP Group update support is now in public preview
entry.summary: Parallel IP Group support enables administrators to simultaneously update multiple IP Groups in a firewall, streamlining the process of implementing devOps changes.

entry.title: Sending a log search alert to unauthorized target resources will no longer be supported
entry.summary: When a log search alert rule is configured with a target resource for which the alert process does not have access or permissions, the rule has an unauthorized target resource. As of Mar 15,2024, sending a log search alert to unauthorized target resources is no longer supported.

entry.title: Azure Elastic SAN is now generally available
entry.summary: Azure Elastic SAN is now generally available, the industry’s first fully managed and cloud-native SAN offering that simplifies deploying, scaling, managing, and configuring a SAN in the cloud.

entry.title: Public preview: Upgrade policies for Virtual Machine Scale Sets using Flexible Orchestration
entry.summary: Upgrade Policies for Virtual Machine Scale Sets using Flexible Orchestration provide a safe and consistent method to keep your scale set instances up-to-date.

entry.title: Public preview: AKS cluster control plane metrics in managed Prometheus
entry.summary: You can now monitor the health, load and performance of the API server and etcd in the control plane of your AKS clusters

entry.title: Generally available: Zone Redundant Storage for Azure Disks is now available in Canada Central
entry.summary: Zone Redundant Storage (ZRS) for Azure Disks is now available on Azure Premium SSD and Standard SSD in the Canada Central region.

entry.title: General availability: Improvements in Azure Key Vault

entry.title: General Availability: Application consistent restore points supports Premium SSD v2 and Ultra Disks
entry.summary: Application consistent restore points supports Premium SSD v2 and Ultra Disks.

entry.title: Azure Ultra Disk Storage is now available in Canada East
entry.summary: Now available in Canada East region, Azure Ultra Disk Storage provides high performance along with sub-millisecond latency for your most-demanding workloads.

entry.title: General availability: Topology
entry.summary: Enhancing network and resource health visualization with unified and dynamic topology across subscriptions, regions, and resource groups integrated with actionable connectivity and traffic insights.

entry.title: Mount Azure Storage as a local share in App Service Linux Now supports NFS
entry.summary: NFS support is now available for App Service Linux code and container when mounting a Azure File share as a local share for the web app.

entry.title: Announcing General Availability to migrate Virtual Network injected Azure Data Explorer Cluster to Private Endpoints
entry.summary: The migration of Azure Virtual Network injected Azure Data Explorer cluster to Private Endpoints in generally available now. The process is simple and can be done using the Azure portal, the ARM template, or any code which uses the ADX SDK.

entry.title: Support for log alert rules that use cross-workspace queries with resource names or qualified name identifiers will be retired on 31 May 2024

entry.title: Azure Virtual Network Manager security admin rule generally available in 30 regions

entry.title: Generally Available: Azure Stack HCI latest feature release

Now, customers who have an Azure Stack HCI subscription can download the latest feature release for their infrastructure. This new Azure Stack HCI release is the version of the product required to run Azure Virtual Desktop on- prem which is also now in GA and called Azure Virtual Desktop for Azure Stack HCI. This is an exciting development as the public preview of this product is in high demand specifically in Healthcare and Financial Services.

entry.title: Generally Available: Continuous model monitoring in Azure Machine Learning

Unlock enhanced insights into the monitoring of your Azure resources with our powerful API. Explore its features and elevate your monitoring experience today!

entry.title: Public Preview: Azure API Center – January Updates

In this update, we are bringing you new features and improvements to help you discover, reuse, and consume your APIs more easily and efficiently. These features are designed to help you streamline your API lifecycle, improve your developer experience, and increase your API adoption.

entry.summary: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in late-January 2024.

entry.title: General availability: Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL Customer-managed keys (CMK)
entry.summary: Customer-managed keys allow you to use your own key for cluster data encryption at rest.

entry.title: General availability: Israel Central region added to Azure HDInsight
General availability: Italy North region added to Azure HDInsight
Use Streaming Ingestion to Azure Data Explorer with Azure Stream Analytics
entry.summary: Use Streaming Ingestion to output data to Azure Data Explorer with Azure Stream Analytics

entry.title: Improved exports experience
entry.summary: Introducing an improved exports experience that makes FinOps easier and more efficient with access to additional datasets and optimized for handling large data. You can also create and manage your exports with a few clicks, download your cost data in FOCUS format, and maintain compatibility with previous schema versions, enhance your security and compliance while saving time and money.

entry.title: Generally available: Up to 50 test fail criteria in Azure Load Testing
entry.summary: You can now specify up to 50 test criteria in your load test.

entry.title: Azure Red Hat OpenShift January 2024 updates
entry.summary: Azure Red Hat OpenShift now offers Resource Health for clusters with integration with Azure Monitor via Signals and Alerts.

entry.title: New Features for graph-match KQL Operator: Enhanced Pattern Matching and Cycle Control
entry.summary: The graph-match operator in Kusto Query Language (KQL) allows you to query your data as a graph and find matches for a specified pattern. The latest update introduces two new features: the cycles parameter and the nonlinear patterns. These features enable you to control how cycles are matched and express more complex and flexible patterns in your graph queries.

entry.title: Automatic Image Creation using Azure VM Image Builder is now generally available
entry.summary: We’re happy to announce automatic image creation using Azure Image Builder is now generally available. This feature improves your speed and efficiency by allowing you the ability to start image builds for new base images automatically.

entry.title: General availability: Azure Data Explorer adds new geospatial capabilities
entry.summary: Kusto now has three new geospatial functions: geo_polygon_to_h3cells(), geo_angle() and geo_azimuth(). These functions are designed to help you better understand and analyze your geospatial data.

entry.title: Generally Available: Azure Monitor VM Insights Dependency Agent support for RHEL 8.6 Linux VMs
entry.summary: Azure Monitor VM Insights now supports Dependency Agent for RHEL 8.6 Linux VMs, enabling you to monitor their network connections and processes in the Azure portal.

entry.title: Azure Advisor integration with Azure Monitor Log Analytics Workspace
entry.summary:
Advisor is a personalized cloud consultant that helps you follow best practices to optimize your Azure deployments.
It analyzes your resource configuration and usage telemetry and then recommends solutions that can help you improve the cost effectiveness, performance, Reliability, and security of your Azure resources.
We in Azure Monitor believe that observability should be cost effective, and we want to help our customers control their cost, operational excellence, performance, reliability, and security of their Azure resources. This, in turn, helps grow their overall satisfaction with, and usage of Azure.
We have introduced several cost optimization related recommendations and added Azure Advisor to the Log Analytics Workspace admin experience. more recommendations are on the way.

entry.title: Public Preview: Circuit Breaker in Azure API Management
entry.summary: Customers now have the capability to configure the circuit breaker property in the backend resource, providing protection for a backend service against being overwhelmed by excessive requests.

entry.title: Public Preview: Load Balancer in Azure API Management
entry.summary: Customers have the ability to create a load balancer that directs traffic to multiple endpoints.

entry.title: Azure Spring Apps Feature Update Q4 2024: Spring Cloud Gateway supports a response cache and more
entry.summary: Recent updates to the Enterprise plan include improved response caching in Spring Cloud Gateway, a more secure try-out option in API Portal, and enhanced application-level settings in Service Connector. Additionally, there's richer build history information to help with troubleshooting. For both Enterprise and Basic/Standard plans, Azure Spring Apps now offer scheduled maintenance for updates and an auto-sync feature for certificates, making application management more efficient and secure.

entry.title: Private Preview: Upgrade existing Azure Gen1 VMs to Gen2-Trusted launch
entry.summary: Support to upgrade existing Gen1 VMs to Trusted launch in preview.

entry.title: General Availability: Azure Database for MySQL Import feature for Azure Database for MySQL Single to Flexible Server migrations
entry.summary: Easily migrate your Azure Database for MySQL – Single Server workloads to Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server with Azure Database for MySQL Import.

entry.title: General Availability: Azure MySQL Import feature for Azure Database for MySQL Single to Flexible Server migrations
entry.summary: Easily migrate your Azure Database for MySQL – Single Server workloads to Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server with Azure MySQL Import.

entry.title: Public preview: Partition merge now supports shared throughput databases
entry.summary: You can now merge partitions in Azure Cosmos DB on shared throughput databases. Merging partitions allows you to reduce the number of physical partitions used for your container.

entry.title: General Availability: Azure Virtual Network encryption
entry.summary: Azure Virtual Network encryption is a feature of Azure Virtual Networks. Virtual network encryption allows you to seamlessly encrypt and decrypt traffic between Azure Virtual Machines.

entry.title: General Availability: Customer-managed keys for Azure NetApp Files volume encryption
entry.summary: Azure NetApp Files volumes supports encryption with customer-managed keys (CMK), using Azure Key Vault for key storage, to enable an extra layer of security for data at rest.

entry.title: General Availability: Premium SSD v2 and Ultra disks support with Trusted launch
entry.summary: Trusted launch VMs now support Azure Premium SSD v2 and Ultra disks storage.

entry.title: Public Preview: Azure Data Explorer connector for Apache Flink
entry.summary: Azure Data Explorer connector for Apache Flink (Public Preview)

entry.title: Azure Ultra Disk Storage is now available in UK West and Poland Central
entry.summary: Now available in the UK West and Poland Central regions, Azure Ultra Disk Storage provides high performance along with sub-millisecond latency for your most-demanding workloads.

entry.title: Generally available: Zone Redundant Storage for Azure Disks is now available in more regions
entry.summary: Zone Redundant Storage (ZRS) for Azure Disks is now available on Azure Premium SSD and Standard SSD in the West US3 and Germany West Central regions.
